scripts.start: sh -ac '. ./.env.dev;   firebase use dev   && react-scripts start'
scripts.dev: sh -ac '. ./.env.dev;   firebase use dev   && react-scripts build && firebase deploy'
scripts.stage: sh -ac '. ./.env.stage; firebase use stage && react-scripts build && firebase deploy'
scripts.live: sh -ac '. ./.env.live;  firebase use live  && react-scripts build && firebase deploy'
